page.title: 17A FAMILY STUDY
page.content: My name is Crita Chotalal Jeram Murji Chavda.I was born in East Africa as was my mum but my dad was born in Leicester.We came to England in 1972.My dad owns a photography shop,my mum works in a factory.My brother is called Yatish and we both attend Beaumont Leys School.My grandma lives in Maidstone but was born in India.She had seven children and her brother died of smallpox when he was 8.She is very religious-she has a bath every morning before ritual prayer. We live in a three bedroomed terraced house and have lived there for 12 years.My dad has fitted the kitchen out himself. I like swimming,hockey,basketball and art.
